channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: IRS faces challenges in 2026 tax season due to workforce cuts, new laws: Watchdog

item.title: A Texas man is facing execution for shooting ex-girlfriend and her new boyfriend
item.description: A Texas man is facing execution for fatally shooting his ex-girlfriend and her new boyfriend nearly 27 years ago in suburban Houston

item.title: A court sentences South Korea's former first lady Kim Keon Hee to 20 months in prison for corruption
